dialogue.htmlContent:
You find yourself standing before one of the largest frontages in the Shopping Arcade. The words 'Pix's Playground' are emblazoned in bright red lettering above the entrance, and beneath, you read the words 'Dominions #1 Gym!'.

Most of the gym's frontage is made up of large glass panels, allowing you to take a good look inside. From what you can see, the interior consists of a wide open space, filled with an impressive variety of gym equipment. #IF(pix.getWorldLocation()==WORLD_TYPE_innoxia_dominion_shopping_arcade_gym) #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_introduced)) Moving your gaze over to look through the main entrance's glass doors, you see Pix sitting behind the reception desk. #ELSE Moving your gaze over to look through the main entrance's glass doors, you see a [pix.race] sitting behind the reception desk. #ENDIF #ELSE Moving your gaze over to look through the main entrance's glass doors, you see a rabbit-girl sitting behind the reception desk. #ENDIF

Although obvious from the fact that all the lights are on and the front desk is staffed, there's a sign hanging on the glass doors which confirms that the gym is currently [style.colourGood(open)], and remains so [style.colourMinorGood(24 hours a day, 7 days of the week)].

You find yourself standing before the glass doors which serve as the gym's main entrance. From here you could proceed forwards to the reception desk, or turn around and head back into the Shopping Arcade...

Pushing open the glass doors, you [pc.step] into the gym and take a quick look around. A short way in front of you stands the reception desk, behind which #IF(pix.getWorldLocation()==WORLD_TYPE_innoxia_dominion_shopping_arcade_gym) #IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_introduced)) the excitable [pix.race], Pix, is standing. #ELSE a very excitable-looking [pix.race] is standing. #ENDIF #ELSE a pretty greater rabbit-girl is standing. #ENDIF Looking past her, you see that the building's cavernous interior is home to dozens of exercise machines, several of which are currently in use by members of this gym.

From here you could proceed forwards to the reception desk, or turn around and head back into the Shopping Arcade...
Deciding that you've had enough of the gym, you push open the glass doors and head back out into the Shopping Arcade...

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(pix)) #IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_introduced))

Proceeding forwards into the gym, you approach the reception desk, where you're enthusiastically greeted by an extremely energetic dog-girl. Her fur is black with white markings, which, in combination with her folded ears, gives her the appearance of an anthropomorphised border-collie.

[pix.speech(Heya! Hi! How're ya doin'!)] she exclaims, reaching forwards to give your [pc.hand(true)] an enthusiastic shake with both of her paw-like hands.

You start to offer this friendly dog-girl a hello, but in her excitement she quickly cuts you off and starts to speak over you.

[pix.speech(Wohoo! So, you've decided to come get fit, huh, huh, huh?)] she asks. Still not giving you a moment in which to reply, she immediately continues, [pix.speech(So don't just stand there! Oh, I'm Pix by the way! Come on, I'll give you a tour!)]

Pix releases your [pc.hand(true)], which she's been violently shaking this entire time, before starting to bound away into the gym, motioning for you to follow her. You notice that her tail hasn't stopped wagging this entire time, and you can't help but think to yourself that she's quite possibly the most energetic person you've ever met.

#ELSE #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_session_started))

Returning to the reception desk, you see that the energetic owner of this gym, Pix, is still standing here. As she catches sight of you, she greets you in her typical, enthusiastic manner.

[pix.speech(Heya, [pc.name]! How's it goin'?! Havin' a good workout?!)] she exclaims, before pausing to flash you a huge grin.

#IF(!pc.hasItemType(ITEM_innoxia_quest_gym_membership_card)) As you start to return her greeting, the hyperactive dog-girl cuts you off, [pix.speech(The eight-thousand flames deal is still on y'know! Only for you! So, you ready to sign up?!)] #ELSE #IF(pc.isVisiblyPregnant()) As you start to return her greeting, the hyperactive dog-girl pointedly looks down at your pregnant belly and cuts you off, [pix.speech(Sorry, but I'm not going to put you through any kind of strenuous activity while you're pregnant, so no personal training for you!)] #ELSE As you start to return her greeting, the hyperactive dog-girl cuts you off, #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_workout_pix_completed)) [pix.speech(I had a lot of fun giving you that personal training earlier! Come back for some more once you've recovered!)] #ELSE [pix.speech(You gonna want some personal training?! I'm ready for it whenever you are!)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF

#ELSE

Proceeding forwards into the gym, you once again find yourself approaching the reception desk. The energetic owner of this gym, Pix, is here to greet you, and she does so in her typical, enthusiastic manner.

[pix.speech(Heya, great to see you again, [pc.name]! How're ya doin'!)] she exclaims, before pausing to flash you a huge grin.

#IF(pix.isVisiblyPregnant()) #IF(!pix.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc))

As you start to return her greeting, you notice that the hyperactive dog-girl is clutching what's clearly her [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)]. Letting out a laugh as she sees what it is you're looking at, Pix exclaims, [pix.speech(That's right, you knocked me up! Come here and have a feel!)]

Doing as the mother of your children says, you [pc.step] forwards and run [pc.a_hand(true)] over her swollen, furry tummy. As you do so, she sighs, [pix.speech(It kind of feels good... But I can't do any proper exercise while I'm like this...)]

#ELSE

As you start to return her greeting, you notice that the hyperactive dog-girl is still clutching what's clearly her [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)]. Letting out a laugh as she sees what it is you're looking at, Pix exclaims, [pix.speech(That's right, I'm still pregnant, thanks to you! Come here and have another feel!)]

Doing as the mother of your children says, you [pc.step] forwards and run [pc.a_hand(true)] over her swollen, furry tummy. As you do so, she sighs, [pix.speech(It kind of feels good... But I can't do any proper exercise while I'm like this...)]

#ENDIF #IF(pc.isVisiblyPregnant())

As you withdraw your [pc.hand(true)], the hyperactive dog-girl pointedly looks down at your pregnant belly and states, [pix.speech(Sorry, but I'm not going to put you through any kind of strenuous activity while you're pregnant, so no personal training for you!)]

#ELSE

Withdrawing your [pc.hand(true)], you smile at Pix and wonder what to do next...

#ENDIF #ELSE

As you start to return her greeting, the hyperactive dog-girl quickly starts to speak over you.

#IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_had_tour))

[pix.speech(Wohoo! So, you've decided to come have that tour, huh, huh, huh?)] she asks, but before you can reply, she continues speaking, [pix.speech(So don't just stand there! Come on, follow me!)]

Pix happily laughs and turns away before starting to bound into the gym, motioning for you to follow her.

#ELSEIF(!pc.hasItemType(ITEM_innoxia_quest_gym_membership_card))

You start to greet the energetic dog-girl, but, once again, she immediately cuts you off, [pix.speech(The eight-thousand flames deal is still on y'know! Only for you! So, you ready to sign up?!)]

#ELSE

You start to greet the energetic dog-girl, but, once again, she immediately cuts you off, #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_workout_pix_completed)) [pix.speech(I had a lot of fun giving you that personal training earlier! Come back for some more once you've recovered!)] #ELSEIF(pc.isVisiblyPregnant()) [pix.speech(Sorry, but I'm not going to put you through any kind of strenuous activity while you're pregnant, so no personal training for you!)] #ELSE [pix.speech(You gonna want some personal training?! I'm ready for it whenever you are!)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE

Proceeding forwards into the gym, you approach the reception desk, where you're greeted by a pretty rabbit-girl, [style.speechFeminine(Hello! Pix isn't here at the moment, but she'll be back at six o'clock.)]

#IF(!pc.hasItemType(ITEM_innoxia_quest_gym_membership_card)) Showing the receptionist your membership card, the rabbit-girl smiles and waves you through, saying, [style.speechFeminine(Enjoy your session!)] #ELSE As she realises that you don't have a membership card to show her, the rabbit-girl says, [style.speechFeminine(It's one-hundred flames per session. Pix handles the memberships, so if you wanted to sign up to become a member of our gym, then please come back during the day.)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF

Wanting to know more Pix's history, you ask her about this gym and how she came to own it.

[pix.speech(Well, y'know, I've always been on the go, right from when I was born, so I kinda always knew that I wanted to be a fitness instructor!)] she happily exclaims, before continuing, [pix.speech(So I worked really hard at getting fit and strong, and so managed to get this place!)]

Thinking that there are a few gaps in Pix's story, you ask her how she managed to afford this gym just by 'working hard to get fit and strong'.

[pix.speech(Oh, I didn't need to afford this place; my dad bought it for me!)] she reveals, [pix.speech(My mum and dad would always tease me by saying that I was 'driving them crazy' or that they 'couldn't take any more', and so to continue the joke my dad bought this gym and told me that I could have it, just so long as I don't go back to visit them more than once a month!)]

Realising that Pix has clearly been born into an extremely wealthy family, you ask her where she goes to visit her parents.

[pix.speech(Oh, well I usually visit mum and dad at their mansion over in Demon Home, but sometimes I go to their place in Thinis, and last month I surprised them by turning up at their estate! You should have seen the looks on their faces!)] she laughs, before loudly asking, [pix.speech(So, is there anything else you wanted to know?)]

Having heard enough, you thank Pix for the information and wonder what to do next...

Curious to hear more about Hannah, you ask Pix how the spotted hyena-girl came to work here as a boxing instructor.

[pix.speech(Oh, well I've known Hannah forever, and after I opened this gym I asked her if she'd like to work here,)] Pix reveals, [pix.speech(She refused the first few times, but persistence pays off, and she eventually agreed to taking the job!)]

Wanting to know a little more, you ask Pix how she met Hannah.

[pix.speech(Well, it was over ten years ago now, but I can remember it like it was yesterday! I was taking a shortcut through some alleyways to get home in time for my nineteenth birthday party, when a group of muggers ambushed me!)] she exclaims. You notice that Pix's tail is excitedly wagging behind her as she continues, [pix.speech(Hannah turned up at that exact moment and beat them all up! I dragged her along to my party and we've been best friends ever since!)]

Happily hopping up and down on the spot, the [pix.race] impatiently waits to hear what it is you'll ask of her next...

Wanting to know more about Brahman, you ask Pix what she can tell you about the bull-boy.

[pix.speech(There's not really much to tell, really,)] she replies after thinking for a moment. Shrugging at you, she continues, [pix.speech(He turned up soon after I opened this gym and offered to work here as a yoga instructor. I accepted, and that was that.)]

Pushing Pix a little further, you ask her if she knows anything about Brahman's history.

[pix.speech(Well, if you've spoken with him, then you know how he is!)] she loudly replies with a laugh, [pix.speech(I can barely understand him at the best of times, and so I gave up trying to find out more about him a long time ago!)]

Flashing you a big smile, Pix waits to see what you'll do next...

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_pix_had_tour)) You quickly tell Pix that you need a moment to think about her offer, but you might come back later. She doesn't seem fazed at all by your reluctant response, and calls out after you as you leave, [pix.speech(No worries! Come back at any time, I'll be waiting to see you again!)] #ELSE You quickly tell Pix that you don't have time for her tour right now, but you might come back later. She doesn't seem fazed at all by your reluctant response, and calls out after you as you leave, [pix.speech(No worries! Come back at any time, I'll be waiting to see you again!)] #ENDIF

You decide to follow the excitable dog-girl, and hurry to catch up with her as she sets off. Following Pix into the cavernous interior of the building, you come to an abrupt halt as the [pix.race] stops in her tracks and turns to face you.

[pix.speech(Right, so to begin with, there on your left are all the cardio machines!)] she loudly exclaims. Looking over to where she's pointing, you see a vast array of running, cycling, and rowing machines neatly lined up beside one another. There are a couple of gym members using these machines, but the vast majority of them are vacant. Keeping her voice raised, Pix happily declares, [pix.speech(It's usually not much busier than this, so when you sign up, you'll find that you never have to wait for any of the equipment! And our yoga studio right here always has space! Our instructor, Brahman, isn't here right now, but he holds regular sessions for gym members!)]

As you're wondering if Pix is even capable of speaking at a normal volume, you look to your right to see a modern-looking, glass-walled studio. Looking into this sound-proofed room, you see that the far wall bears images of lotus flowers and silhouettes of different yoga poses, while about a dozen rolled up mats are stacked up in the corner. The studio is currently deserted, which, along with seeing how few people are in the gym, makes you wonder if Pix's overbearing, hyperactive personality has put people off from coming here.

Not giving you much time to dwell on this, Pix bounces up and down on the spot and declares, [pix.speech(Come on, there's more to see!)]

Following Pix down the path which leads through the high-ceilinged building, you quickly arrive at your next stop, where the [pix.race] shouts, [pix.speech(Here's where we have all the resistance machines and free weights! Oh, and right here's the changing rooms and showers, which lead on through to our saunas and indoor pool! Now follow me! Follow me! Let's go see the boxing rings!)]

Making a ninety-degree turn, Pix skips along through the gym, leaving you to hurry along behind her. Passing all of the resistance machines, and noting how there are once again only a couple of people using them, you soon arrive at your destination.

[pix.speech(Oh, great! Hannah's giving a lesson!)] Pix shouts as she comes to a halt in front of you.

Looking past the [pix.race], you see that the area in front of you holds two full-sized boxing rings, while lined up around them are dozens of punching bags, bench presses, and free weights. There are about a dozen people here, making it far more popular than the rest of the gym, and you see that they're all currently standing around one of the rings. In the arena, a huge, muscular stag-boy is engaged in a bout of bare-knuckle boxing with a greater spotted hyena-girl, who you assume to be Hannah.

[pix.speech(After you've signed up to be a member, then you can go to Hannah to get boxing lessons!)] Pix exclaims.

As you continue to watch the pair of pugilists, you can't help but think that Hannah is vastly outmatched. Although the hyena-girl's furry stomach is formed into a rock-hard six-pack, and her muscular arms and legs look to be extremely strong, the stag-boy is both taller and bulkier than she is, and looks to be quite agile as he dances around in front of his opponent. You almost can't bear to watch as he suddenly throws a mighty punch at Hannah, but the hyena-girl ducks to one side at the last moment, before darting forwards and delivering a trio of lightning-fast punches to his torso.

[pix.speech(Oh, wait, this doesn't look like a lesson...)] Pix sighs, and you find yourself more surprised at the fact that she isn't shouting for once than by her words. Shaking her head, she tuts and says, [pix.speech(I'd better stop this.)]

As the [pix.race] strides towards the ring, you see the stag-boy staggering to one side as he tries to recover from the blows he's just received. Before Pix can bring an end to the fight, the stag-boy briefly drops one hand to clutch his bruised ribs, giving Hannah the opening she needs. Her left fist shoots out with such speed that her opponent has no time in which to react, and a moment later the stag-boy is tumbling to the ground, unconscious.

[pix.speech(Ok, that's enough!)] Pix shouts, [pix.speech(Hannah, I told you to stop accepting challenges!)]

[hannah.speech(Yeah, yeah, it won't happen again,)] the hyena-girl grunts, before spitting on the floor and leaping down out of the ring. Seeing that the stag-boy's friends are gathering around to help him out, Pix leaves matters to them and returns to where you're standing.

[pix.speech(Sorry about that!)] she exclaims, [pix.speech(Hannah's got a bit of a reputation, so we sometimes get people coming here just to challenge her! It doesn't end well for them... Anyway, let's head back to the front desk!)]

Leaving Hannah and the boxing rings behind, you follow Pix as she leads you back to the reception area. Taking her place behind the desk, she flashes you a huge smile and shouts, [pix.speech(So, what'ya think?! Pretty awesome, huh?!)]

You only manage to get out a few words in response before the excitable [pix.race] cuts you off. Moving onto the business-side of things, she exclaims, [pix.speech(Now, life-time membership is ten-thousand flames, or you can just pay each time you come here, which is one-hundred flames per entry! So, what'll be?! If you get the life-time membership, that includes personal workout sessions with none other than your new friend, Pix!)]

Although it's a life-time membership, you can't help but think that ten thousand flames seems a little steep. Clearly sensing your hesitation, Pix quickly offers you a deal, [pix.speech(You know, I don't do this often, but I can see that you're kinda special and I'd really like to get the chance to work with that body of yours, so just for you, I'll say life-time membership is only eight-thousand flames! Pretty good, huh? So, what'll it be?!)]

You tell Pix that you want to sign up for a lifetime membership. A huge smile spreads over her face, and she leaps up, punching the air and letting out a triumphant shout.

[pix.speech(Wohoo! That's fantastic! Now I can help you train and stuff, and you can come and go any time you want without paying anything extra!)] she explains, and without warning, she leaps forwards and gives you a hug.

You're somewhat taken aback by her sudden move, but before you can react, she releases you and ducks down to fetch a contract from beneath her desk. After grabbing the piece of paper and a pen, she slams them down onto the counter and excitedly booms, [pix.speech(Ok! So, sign here, here, and here!)]

After signing your name at three different places on the page, you hand over the eight thousand flame fee, thereby completing the contract. Handing you a rather disappointingly-flimsy cardboard membership card, the [pix.race] cheers, [pix.speech(Awesome! So, that's all done! Congratulations! Just call me over whenever you're ready for some personal training! Oh, and you can now take boxing lessons with Hannah, or attend yoga sessions with Brahman!)]

Having now gained access to all that the gym has to offer, you wonder where to go first...

#IF(pix.getWorldLocation()==WORLD_TYPE_innoxia_dominion_shopping_arcade_gym)

You tell Pix that you just want to pay for a single session in the gym, before handing over the one hundred flame fee.

[pix.speech(Thanks, [pc.name]! You've now got full access to the gym, but that's lost when you decide to leave, so if you go and come back later, you'll have to pay again!)] the [pix.race] happily shouts as you pass by the reception desk. Bouncing up and down on the spot, she calls after you, [pix.speech(Remember, if you get a life-time membership, I can help you to train!)]

Having now gained access to the gym, you wonder where to go first...

#ELSE

You tell the rabbit-girl that you want to pay for a single session in the gym, before handing over the one hundred flame fee.

[pix.speech(Thank you! You've now got full access to the gym, but that's lost when you decide to leave, so if you go and come back later, you'll have to pay again,)] the receptionist explains as you pass by her desk.

Having now gained access to the gym, you wonder where to go first...

#ENDIF

Deciding that you'll take Pix up on her offer, you start to say that you'd like to have a personal workout session with her, but before you're even halfway through your first sentence, she hastily interrupts you in her eagerness to respond, [pix.speech(Wohoo! So, like, you want to have a good workout, huh?! Come on! Let's start over here!)]

Doing as she says, you follow Pix as she skips over to the area of the gym which houses the free weights. Directing you to pick up a pair of dumbbells, she begins to show you her special routine, and directs you as you work your way through every set of muscles on your body.

[pix.speech(C'mon! You can do better than that, can'tcha?!)] Pix exclaims, energetically jumping up and down on the spot.

You feel as though you're already working quite hard, and if you were to push yourself any further, you'd quickly get very fatigued. Then again, you are trying to get fitter, and Pix is a professional... Maybe you should give it your all?

Deciding that it'd be best to give Pix one hundred percent of your effort, you fully commit to the exercise. Following the [pix.race]'s instructions, you work your way through several sets of weights, before moving on to the resistance machines and continuing your workout there. By the time you're done, you're left panting and feeling thoroughly worn out.

The routine isn't over just yet, however, for as soon as you're done with the weights, Pix excitably shouts, [pix.speech(Great job, [pc.name]! Now let's go get some cardio work in!)]

Not wanting to exhaust yourself, you decide to hold back a little. Following Pix's instructions, you work your way through several sets of weights, before moving on to the resistance machines and continuing your workout there. Although you maintain the impression that you're putting all of your effort into it, you don't fully commit yourself to the exercise routine.

Pix doesn't seem to pick up on the fact that you're holding back, for as soon as you're done with the weights, she excitably shouts, [pix.speech(Great job, [pc.name]! Now let's go get some cardio work in!)]

[pix.speech(Come on now! No slacking!)] Pix shouts as she bounces over towards the running machines.

You can't help but let out a groan as you see what Pix has got in store for you. The dog-girl's tail, which up until now hasn't stopped wagging, flicks upright for a second, before continuing its seemingly uncontrollable motion.

[pix.speech(Hey! I heard that! Come on now, if you give me thirty more minutes, I'll make it worth your while!)] she teases, before giving you a wink and then pushing you onto one of the running machines.

With her excitable manner of talking over you, combined with the fact that you've been breathing heavily throughout Pix's exercise routine, you've been completely unable to get out a single sentence. You wonder what she means by making it 'worth your while', but as the [pix.race] turns the machine on and gets you to start running, you're given a clear idea of what's on her mind. As you run, Pix moves around behind you, and you can almost feel her lustful gaze resting on your rear end.

[pix.speech(Mmm! Y'know, you've got one hot ass!)] she giggles, [pix.speech(Now show me what you're made of!)]

Once again, you find yourself with a choice to make. Should you put in your full amount of effort, or hold back and conserve your energy?

Wanting to show Pix what you can do, you decide to set the machine for a steady run. Pix lets out an impressed hum as she sees what speed you're setting the machine to, [pix.speech(Mmm... You're eager to show off for me, aren't ya?)]

Unwilling to completely exhaust yourself on the running machine, you decide to settle for a slow jog. Pix lets out a mildly annoyed huff as she sees what speed you're setting the machine to, [pix.speech(Huh... You're more exhausted than I thought! You're gonna need to get fitter, aren't ya?)]

You feel completely exhausted from your workout, and will be unable to do any more exercise until you've had time to recover.
You've [style.colourExcellent(completed your progress)] towards gaining a [style.colourPhysique(unique perk)]!

You feel completely exhausted from your workout, and will be unable to do any more exercise until you've had time to recover.
You've [style.colourMinorGood(gained [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]% progress)] towards gaining a [style.colourPhysique(unique perk)]!
Total progress: [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1]%

As you exercise, Pix uses the opportunity to check you out, making inappropriate comments every now and then about the state of your body, [pix.speech(That's right, keep working that ass for me... Mmm, yeah, that's good...)]

As focused as you are on having to keep up with the treadmill's movement, you're unable to respond to the pervy comments, and just focus on what you're doing instead.

After what feels like an eternity, the [pix.race] finally leans over and dials the difficulty back, instructing you to take a few minutes to do a cooldown walk. As you pant from exertion, she leans over and uses a towel to wipe the sweat from your forehead. She brushes her hand over your body as she retracts, and reminds you of what she promised earlier, [pix.speech(You're like, my star pupil, y'know! I said I'd make it worth your while, remember?! How about we head on over to the showers so that I can give you a special one-to-one cooldown exercise?)]

Enticingly sliding her paw-like hands over her breasts, Pix bites her lip and waits to hear your response...

You don't like the sound of Pix's 'special one-to-one cooldown exercise', so you tell her that you'll give it a miss this time.

[pix.speech(Aww... That's too bad!)] she exclaims, before pouting and laughing, [pix.speech(Well, once you've recovered, come back to see me again and we can do another workout session!)]

With that, the [pix.race] skips off to the reception desk, leaving you wondering what to do next...

Deciding that you don't want to let Pix down, you tell her that you'll join her in the showers. Joyously bouncing up and down as she hears your response, the [pix.race] exclaims, [pix.speech(Wohoo! See you there!)]

With that, she leaves you behind as she sprints off full-pelt in the direction of the showers. As you watch her go, a wave of exhaustion suddenly crashes over you. Pix's exercise routine seems to have been designed specifically to completely wear you out, and you wonder if you've even got the energy for the 'special one-to-one cooldown exercise' that you've accepted.

Heading over to the showers, you quickly strip out of your clothes, before scanning around for any sign of your over-enthusiastic personal trainer. The place looks to be completely deserted, and, assuming that Pix will show up once you've got the taps running, you step into the shower and start to clean yourself off.

Over the crashing noise of the falling water, you're unable to hear the dog-girl as she sneaks up on you. Facing the wall, you don't even have the chance to spot her approach, or to see the predatory grin that she fails to conceal upon sighting your naked body. In fact, you're completely oblivious to Pix's presence, right up until the moment she pounces forwards and pins you up against the wall.

You start to let out a yell in surprise, but the dog-girl quickly clasps a paw-like hand over your mouth as she leans in, pressing her naked body against yours as she growls in your ear, [pix.speech(Haha! So, like, you ready for your special cooldown?! Y'know, I'm like, super into punishments, orgasm denial, and all that good stuff, so if you aren't interested in that kinda thing, now's your chance to let me know!)]

As she lifts her hand from over your mouth, you're given a chance to respond...

As tired as you are, Pix's offer seems too good to turn down, and so you turn your head to one side and eagerly tell her to get started. Although you can't see her reaction, you feel her grip on your wrists tighten as you try to turn to face her. Leaning into your back, Pix growls into your ear once more, [pix.speech(That's the spirit! This is gonna be, like, super fun!)]

As she speaks, she releases the grip on one of your wrists, and as she crushes you up against the wall of the shower, you feel her hand slip around and down #IF(pc.hasLegs())between your legs#ELSEto your groin#ENDIF. You let out a gasp as she starts stroking your crotch, and as her naked breasts squish into your back, her growls soften down a little, [pix.speech(You're gonna be a good [pc.girl] for Pix now, aren't ya?!)]

You're far too tired for any more physical exercise right now, and so tell Pix as such. As she hears this, the [pix.race]'s grip on your wrists instantly loosens, and she steps back, letting out a disappointed whine, [pix.speech(Aww, that's, like too bad! Well, maybe we can have some fun the next time you're here!)]

Throwing you a mischievous grin, she bolts off towards the exit, calling out behind her as she goes, [pix.speech(Please do come back soon! You're, like, my star pupil!)]

Smiling to yourself, you continue with your shower, wondering if you'll take up Pix's offer in the future. After you're done, you head back into the changing rooms, and without further incident, dry yourself off, get changed, and wonder where to go next...

Pix hooks her arms under yours and helps you to stagger out from the showers. Leaving you standing in the locker room, she quickly darts of to fetch a towel, before rushing back and starting to gently dry your body off.

[pix.speech(You're, like, the best, y'know! Thanks for letting me have some fun, I hope you enjoyed it too!)]

You're far too tired to respond, and instead simply let out a satisfied groan as the dog-girl quickly helps to dress you.
